data.name: My Time At Portia - Player Costume Package
data.detailed_description:
The Mysterious Man has visited Portia a third time! This eccentric businessman spends his time traveling the world collecting fashionable clothes from different cities. During his latest visit to Portia, he decided to gift to you several outfits from far-away Sandrock and even the Old World!

In this pack you will receive 4 alternative outfits for both the male and female playing characters:

- Sandrock Deputy
- Futurewave
- Extra Drippy
- Comfy Jamjams
data.about_the_game:
The Mysterious Man has visited Portia a third time! This eccentric businessman spends his time traveling the world collecting fashionable clothes from different cities. During his latest visit to Portia, he decided to gift to you several outfits from far-away Sandrock and even the Old World!

In this pack you will receive 4 alternative outfits for both the male and female playing characters:

- Sandrock Deputy
- Futurewave
- Extra Drippy
- Comfy Jamjams
data.short_description: New Player Costume and NPC Eveningwear packs available
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, French, German, Traditional Chinese, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+ / 8.1 / 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI 7770, Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 Processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX960+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MAC OS X 10.15 +
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
